__e: Okay, one, you sound like a girl, and two, I think if you were really, really in love with her, you'd feel a little more passionate than that.
But this car business, it does seem to me that cars, you sometimes claim you're not a car man, but you bloody well are.
I beg your pardon, sir, but I know what a huge admirer you are of George Washington. I thought you might want to take a look at this.
